title: Accolade Partners Is Raising a $175 Million Fund to Back Crypto Venture Funds
sub_head: The asset manager is launching its second crypto fund of funds, and says its first such portfolio is outperforming its stable of non-crypto funds
body:
Accolade Partners, a longtime backer of traditional venture and growth equity funds, is upping the ante on an emerging type of venture funds—those focused on cryptocurrency startups.
Accolade is raising $175 million for Accolade Partners Blockchain II LP, its second crypto fund of funds, which will invest in about 10 crypto venture funds, said Atul Rustgi, a partner at the firm. Accolade’s first crypto fund closed with $124 million in the first quarter.
